entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Truro
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:21 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Debert 07:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: E 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this morning. Showers beginning this morning. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to periods of snow this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
